content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: TSPARMCD
      operator: equal_to
      value: SRANDOM
    - name: TSVAL
      operator: not_equal_to
      value: Y
    - name: TSVAL
      operator: not_equal_to
      value: N
Core:
  Id: CDISC.SENDIG.251
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: When TSPARMCD=SRANDOM, the value of TSVAL must be either "Y" or "N".
Outcome:
  Message: The value of TSVAL is not "Y" or "N" for TSPARMCD=SRANDOM
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SENDIG
        Version: '3.1'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SENDIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: '251'
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: TSVAL values associated with TSPARMCD=SRANDOM would
                  be "Y" or "N".
                Document: IG v3.1
                Item: Specification
                Section: 7.6.3
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - TRIAL DESIGN
  Domains:
    Include:
      - TS

json.Description: When TSPARMCD=SRANDOM, the value of TSVAL must be either "Y" or "N".

Outcome.Message: The value of TSVAL is not "Y" or "N" for TSPARMCD=SRANDOM

Citations.Cited_Guidance: TSVAL values associated with TSPARMCD=SRANDOM would be "Y" or "N".
